sn35.131:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye.
sn35.131:1.2: Atha kho nakulapita gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho nakulapita gahapati bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.131:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti?
sn35.131:1.4: Ko pana, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti?
sn35.131:1.5: “Santi kho, gahapati, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.131:1.6: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.131:1.7: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam vinnanam hoti tadupadanam.
sn35.131:1.10: santi kho, gahapati, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.131:1.11: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.131:1.12: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato tannissitam vinnanam hoti tadupadanam.
sn35.131:1.14: Ayam kho, gahapati, hetu ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme no parinibbayanti.
sn35.131:2.1: Santi ca kho, gahapati, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.131:2.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn35.131:2.3: Tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato na tannissitam vinnanam hoti, na tadupadanam.
sn35.131:2.6: santi kho, gahapati, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.131:2.7: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati.
sn35.131:2.8: Tassa tam nabhinandato nabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato na tannissitam vinnanam hoti na tadupadanam.
sn35.131:2.10: Ayam kho, gahapati, hetu, ayam paccayo yena m’idhekacce satta dittheva dhamme parinibbayanti”ti.
